name: Figames: âš” The Hero's Journey
description:
The path of the hero, what a great way of thinking user flows, journeys and build prototypes by empathizing with users. There is a great book out there by Joseph Cambel's so I recommend you check it out.


In this community file I was playing with interactive components with the Hero Journey in mind.


Click on tiles to navigate the maze and reach the sword of destiny, the great reward, the ultimate knowledge âš”
